html: Under H.R. 1, taxpayer dollars will be going to support entrenched politicians and political consultants who we don’t agree with or want to support.
text: Under H.R. 1, taxpayer dollars will be going to support entrenched politicians and political consultants who we don’t agree with or want to support.

html: Our tax dollars should go to funding our military and protecting American citizens, not to promoting politicians we don’t even agree with. That’s why I’m voting no on H.R. 1.
text: Our tax dollars should go to funding our military and protecting American citizens, not to promoting politicians we don’t even agree with. That’s why I’m voting no on H.R. 1.

html: H.R. 1 takes power away from voters and puts it in the hands of convicted criminals. The bill would strip voters of their 14th Amendment rights to limit the vote to people who haven’t been convicted of murder, violent felonies, or other serious crimes.
text: H.R. 1 takes power away from voters and puts it in the hands of convicted criminals. The bill would strip voters of their 14th Amendment rights to limit the vote to people who haven’t been convicted of murder, violent felonies, or other serious crimes.

html: H.R. 1 is a slap in the face to our democratic system. This bill attacks the rights of the states and puts our election security at risk.
text: H.R. 1 is a slap in the face to our democratic system. This bill attacks the rights of the states and puts our election security at risk.

html: Under H.R. 1, there would be no checks and balances to prevent voter fraud and no penalties for ineligible individuals voting in error.
text: Under H.R. 1, there would be no checks and balances to prevent voter fraud and no penalties for ineligible individuals voting in error.

html: Same-day voter registration is a threat to our democratic process. When voters are allowed to register on the same day there is very little room to confirm identity and ensure they are voting in the correct election.
text: Same-day voter registration is a threat to our democratic process. When voters are allowed to register on the same day there is very little room to confirm identity and ensure they are voting in the correct election.

html: Every day, personal data is at risk online. With H.R. 1, the democrats would add to this threat by requiring states to maintain online voter registration with no safeguards.
text: Every day, personal data is at risk online. With H.R. 1, the democrats would add to this threat by requiring states to maintain online voter registration with no safeguards.

html: H.R. 1 would require that all states adopt an automatic voter registration system that would rely on the federal government for records. This could lead to thousands of registration errors and the registration of ineligible voters.
text: H.R. 1 would require that all states adopt an automatic voter registration system that would rely on the federal government for records. This could lead to thousands of registration errors and the registration of ineligible voters.

html: Don’t be fooled—H.R. 1 is legislation that has been designed to fund, elect, and maintain the Democratic majority, all while ignoring states’ rights and wasting taxpayer dollars.
text: Don’t be fooled—H.R. 1 is legislation that has been designed to fund, elect, and maintain the Democratic majority, all while ignoring states’ rights and wasting taxpayer dollars.

html: Thank you @fema for granting Punta Gorda over $21.2 Million to reimburse expenses related to Hurricane Irma damage through the Public Assistance program. html: Did you know that it has been 200 years since the territory of Florida was added to the United States? Learn more about the Adams-Onís Treaty and what I’m doing to commemorate this important anniversary on my website: https://steube.house.gov/media/press-releases/steube-introduces-resolution-commemorate-bicentennial-adams-s-treaty … #AdamsOnísAt200

html: Today, I visited the @HomeDepot in Venice, FL. I toured the store, discussed their “Doing More for Veterans Program,” and even got my own apron! html: House Judiciary Dems aren’t interested in stopping gun violence, they’re interested in pushing a political agenda that ignores the rights of millions of law-abiding gun owners. This was clear when they rejected my Amendment this afternoon. Learn more here:https://bit.ly/2tkZuSh
text: House Judiciary Dems aren’t interested in stopping gun violence, they’re interested in pushing a political agenda that ignores the rights of millions of law-abiding gun owners. This was clear when they rejected my Amendment this afternoon. Learn more here:https://bit.ly/2tkZuSh

html: .@RepGregSteube offered an amendment to flag denied background checks for law enforcement. Rep. Cicilline introduced a nearly identical bill last year. Democrats just rejected the amendment. What changed?
text: .@RepGregSteube offered an amendment to flag denied background checks for law enforcement. Rep. Cicilline introduced a nearly identical bill last year. Democrats just rejected the amendment. What changed?

html: Today I filed an amendment that requires anyone who fails a background check to be reported to law enforcement. Dems voted against it. This gun control bill isn’t about public safety. It’s about taking away the rights of law-abiding citizens.
text: Today I filed an amendment that requires anyone who fails a background check to be reported to law enforcement. Dems voted against it. This gun control bill isn’t about public safety. It’s about taking away the rights of law-abiding citizens.

html: My thoughts and prayers are with the victims of today’s tragic shooting in Sebring. We will stand by law enforcement as they continue their investigation. Thank you Sheriff Blackman and the brave men and women of @HighCoSheriff’s Office. To the people of Sebring, we are with you.
text: My thoughts and prayers are with the victims of today’s tragic shooting in Sebring. We will stand by law enforcement as they continue their investigation. Thank you Sheriff Blackman and the brave men and women of @HighCoSheriff’s Office. To the people of Sebring, we are with you.
